key.name: grouping-mode
key.description: Decides when to group windows from the same application on the window list. Possible values are “never”, “auto” and “always”.

key.name: display-all-workspaces
key.description: Whether to show windows from all workspaces or only the current one.

key.name: show-on-all-monitors
key.summary: Show the window list on all monitors
key.description: Whether to show the window list on all connected monitors or only on the primary one.
